name: Adidas Womens Defiant Speed 2 Tennis
product_description: What's the point of setting targets if you can't reach them in record time? Created for players in a hurry to succeed, these adidas Defiant Speed 2 shoes keep you quick with a lightweight mono-mesh upper and hard court-optimized Adiwear outsole. Support in the midfoot area helps you react quickly when opponents try to catch you off guard. The flexible Bounce midsole smooths out every sprint and sidestep. The shoes feature padded rubber insole, natural rubber lining, and Adituff toe design. Lace-up closure. Signature three-stripe design on the side. Low-top silhouette. Regular fit. Rubber outsole.

name: WILSON Men's Rush Pro Ace Tennis Shoes
product_description: The Wilson Men's Rush Pro Ace Wide Tennis Shoes continue the strong tradition of the Rush Pro 3.0 and 3.5. The Ace has the same outsole as the above-mentioned models, and the upper is constructed of a breathable mesh, which offers strong ventilation and support. To enhance the shoe's stability, Wilson added the 4D Support Chassis and to cushion and protect the heel, they incorporated the RDST + EVA construction. The RP Ace is the perfect shoe for a recreational tennis or pickleball player. Compared with the Rush Pro 4.0, the Ace has a more spacious toe box. Upper: Constructed of breathable mesh, the upper balances breathability with support. Midsole:R-DST+utilizes highly compressed EVA material for dynamic cushioning and rebound. The 4D Support Chassis is an asymmetrical, heel-to-toe chassis that delivers enhanced stability, and limits supination and torsion. This helps players control pivot movements while setting up for powerful strokes. Outsole: The all-courtDuralastoutsole provides excellent durability and traction. Designed for hard court usage. Color: Black and Ombre Blue

name: Wilson Mens Rush Pro Lite Men's Tennis Shoes
product_description: The new Rush Pro Lite Tennis Shoes uphold the familiar Rush Pro DNA by providing ultimate comfort with each step. Players experience maximum comfort through a wide toe box fit, breathable mesh, and arch technologies that enhance stability and flexibility. Additionally, the curved sole provides support at all three phases of your stride and aids a smooth transition from heel-strike to toe-off.
